column1: When Democrat governors issue coronavirus restrictions do they follow them?  THREAD👇🏻

The United States Government asked 20-year-old soldiers in 1944 to risk everything to fight Nazis and save the world but won’t ask 20-year-old civilians in 2020 to honor those veterans and take precautions from the coronavirus. https://t.co/6m9lsTa8TZ

Exactly one year ago China unleashed coronavirus.  Little did we know the irreversible damage millions would face due to their misconduct - Americans dead our national security endangered and businesses destroyed.  It's time we hold them accountable.  https://t.co/Yb0VUBklEh

Thanks to President @realDonaldTrump's #OperationWarpSpeed a coronavirus vaccine has proven to be more than 90% effective in Phase III trials.  This monumental achievement has America on the cusp of defeating this pandemic once and for all.  https://t.co/kIk6MpgW3m

And while the American people were suffering from the COVID-19 pandemic Speaker Pelosi capitalized on their hurt by trying to sneak changes to requirements on voter IDs vote by mail and ballot harvesting into aid. It’s no accident this was her focus. https://t.co/YeNPY6ttw1

Senate Democrats claim to hate the filibuster but just exploited it to block $500 billion in coronavirus relief for American small businesses and families.   It's clear DC Democrats will use anything at their disposal for their political games.  https://t.co/fkkwkokNDF

Happy to be at Rudd Farms in Greensboro this afternoon with @USDA Under Secretary @BillAtUSDA and @NCAgriculture Commissioner Steve Troxler to discuss the coronavirus food program and support for our farmers who relentlessly feed our state each and every day. https://t.co/feQ3gPeQzS
Even "GOP apologist" Wolf Blitzer knows the truth: Nancy Pelosi continues to resist and delay coronavirus relief at the expense of America's families and small businesses.  https://t.co/5Noi0lRjc4

Nancy Pelosi will go down every avenue to erase the 2016 election and forcefully remove President @realDonaldTrump from office but will barely do any negotiating to deliver coronavirus relief to the American people.  https://t.co/C8GscrHgwl

If it weren't for Hillary Clinton Nancy Pelosi would have no excuse for completely ignoring coronavirus for months while solely focusing instead on a sham impeachment of a duly-elected President.  https://t.co/Iz86ednAmV

North Carolina small businesses continue to showcase their resiliency as our state grapples with the effects from COVID-19.   These grants not only lift our community up but bolsters our economic fortitude and assures that NC will come back stronger than before this pandemic. https://t.co/v8jou9y67y

Welcome back to North Carolina President @realDonaldTrump and @IvankaTrump!   We are pleased to have you in the Tar Heel State supporting our farmers and their work through the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program.  https://t.co/qmgQkWlY5A

Here in Greensboro Industries of the Blind is selflessly working to produce over 400000 masks for the @USArmy.   Truly amazed by their efforts to keep our service men and women safe from COVID-19 as they protect our nation every day. https://t.co/KaIYKuTntj

.@DukeHospital is hard at work combatting COVID-19.  I was lucky to be able to learn about their response tour one of five testing sites and speak with the incredible medical professionals on the front lines of this pandemic.  Thank you for having me and keep up the good fight! https://t.co/LBY1Hdghub

Sure thing @SenatorTimScott! I'm proud to join my Congressional colleagues in the #WearAMask challenge to combat #COVID19.  I challenge @SenMikeLee and @cathymcmorris to show off their masks in our collective efforts to fight this pandemic! https://t.co/mC6Mps6YaN https://t.co/LgiTA7lKfB

While Democrats downplay the Chinese Communist Party's role in spreading this pandemic around the world Americans aren't fooled.  78% of our nation rightfully place blame on China for the global spread of coronavirus.  We need to hold them accountable.  https://t.co/UtbggYnUGC

As U.S. scientists & doctors are working to develop a coronavirus vaccine Russian hackers are aiming to steal our research.  We must work to strengthen our cybersecurity infrastructure against future attacks & hold Russia accountable for any involvement.  https://t.co/b8Uyn5HrHe
.@SecPompeo is right.   The Chinese Communist Party must be held responsible for their many atrocities including the spread of the coronavirus pandemic.  https://t.co/Jx2HdyrCud
Don't forget: Today is #TaxDay!  In response to the coronavirus pandemic the IRS extended the due date to today July 15th. https://t.co/OwEJqhGOwa

Out of many one! Great to have my friend @frank_mickens back in the Triad and leading this FaithFire Freedom Tailgate event. Privileged to be invited to speak & join Frank proving that being socially distant doesn’t mean we can’t be together in faith in freedom and in family! https://t.co/iPmEJNr9qZ

Our local churches continue to be leaders during this pandemic.    Evangel Fellowship in East Greensboro teamed up with @TRIADADULT over the weekend to offer free coronavirus testing to North Carolinians.  https://t.co/idPajl7yVj

Whether it's protecting our communities or assisting with the coronavirus response the NC National Guard supports our state endlessly. Local restaurants in Raleigh showed their appreciation by surprising them with free meals.  Thank you for all you do!  https://t.co/EUhn0i1yPg

Throughout this pandemic our healthcare workers have been on the frontlines fighting coronavirus and helping our families friends and neighbors. Alex Herman of Guilford County set out to thank them one sign at a time.   Read more about his efforts here:  https://t.co/nq3006oOdE

Grateful for our customs officers who have made more than 500 seizures totaling 870K unapproved coronavirus treatments tests & masks since mid-March. The dangerous items could have put us at risk but thanks to these efforts our families are protected.  https://t.co/ngmvOjMVSN

Our skyrocketing national debt must not be ignored. I am proud to join a bipartisan group of my colleagues in urging for provisions in our next COVID legislation to address this looming threat. https://t.co/WxGHzZYc9O

Our North Carolina National Guard is busier than ever helping our state - and the nation. From assisting with the coronavirus response to being deployed in the Middle East their contributions are endless.  Thank you for all you do!  https://t.co/QjMgMoToQD

Small businesses have been shattered because of COVID. Imposing harmful regulations would create additional barriers getting them back on their feet.  OSHA & CDC resources are best spent assisting American workers & businesses rather than complying with more bureaucratic demands. https://t.co/jkRwPiYrpg

North Carolina has been hit hard by coronavirus. Our small businesses and workers – especially those in the hospitality industry – have faced much economic harm. Why is Gov. Cooper allowing other states to openly shop for what will bring $150M+ to our economy? Stop the politics. https://t.co/WOdqais6MQ
Some North Carolina Lawmakers Take Aim at China Amid Coronavirus Outbreak https://t.co/RgittLVJjj

In honor of our frontline workers during the coronavirus pandemic the Flying For The Flag Bandit Flight Team is doing flyovers at hospitals as well as in Greensboro & Winston-Salem (May 19) & Charlotte (May 21).  We appreciate you frontline workers!  https://t.co/nTHXBYvwgE
Our office is here to assist you. How can we serve you in the coronavirus response?  Please visit https://t.co/pzo2CtaVPs for more information and resources. https://t.co/QHqtyzGnbB

Thanks to the @HHSGov 39 health centers in NC will receive nearly $13 million to help with coronavirus testing.  Continuing the wide availability of testing while the state works to reopen is key to our commitment to help NC through these tough times.  https://t.co/XcIwXtPeS9
We're live now for a special virtual Congressional Town Hall on @myfox8 to discuss the coronavirus pandemic and answer your important questions. Tune in!  https://t.co/SgKYsZfbqX
Post coronavirus I have no issue keeping a social distance of two feet indefinitely. No more personal space violations - it’s the law close talkers!

I would be very interested in hearing @SpeakerPelosi explain how the SALT tax deduction – a $31190 tax cut for those in the top 1% and only a $10 tax cut for middle-income taxpayers – is an emergency response to COVID.  I know one person who would benefit from it: @SpeakerPelosi https://t.co/Mug58ZiBGv
Government leaders consider more funds for small businesses facing COVID-19 hardships https://t.co/5VBT0gu6Xv

Americans across the nation are suffering the tragic effects of coronavirus yet Joe Biden wants to end more lives and deem it "essential"? Life is essential – born and in the womb sick and healthy. https://t.co/zJFpbKGKsy

China's lies and disinformation are unacceptable. We will hold them accountable for their role in the spread of the #COVID19 pandemic that has cost American lives and shut down our economy. https://t.co/iYUxMwAoac

Nonprofits are on the frontlines of this fight – they were there first and will be there long after ‘stay-at-home’ orders fade. Our legislation will empower nonprofits to combat #COVID19 and help our neighbors by encouraging support through tax relief.  https://t.co/U2Wv6Z3hkL

Great to see our industries and universities coming together to fight #COVID19 and assist healthcare workers on the front line. We will beat this virus because of efforts like these. https://t.co/Eqo9dqTNUN

HAPPENING NOW: Joining my colleagues @SenatorTimScott @ChrisCoons and @repcleaver in calling for April to be a National Month of Prayer while we face the #Coronavirus.  Watch here: https://t.co/rsai8f774K

Every day in April please join @SenatorTimScott @ChrisCoons and @RepCleaver and I in bringing us all together at 12pm ET/9am PT for a moment of prayer to help lift up those suffering from #COVID19 and those serving on the front lines of this crisis. https://t.co/TU2c5NvAaB
I guess Clyburn wasn’t bluffing when he stated that COVID-19 pandemic "is a tremendous opportunity to restructure things to fit our [House Democrats] vision.” https://t.co/NZv8mV2D5x

Prayer is a source of strength and hope for so many Americans. @SenatorTimScott @repcleaver @ChrisCoons and I are encouraging the nation to unite in prayer every day in April at 12:00pm ET/9:00am PT to lift up our nation and all those fighting #COVID19.  https://t.co/qIv0Ca2Tcq

Good move by the @NCAA to grant spring athletes another year of eligibility due to the #Coronavirus outbreak.  These are tough times for everyone including student-athletes. I’m glad to see they will have the opportunity to achieve their dreams next season. #StudentAthleteEquity

Once we make sure our families health care workers and small businesses have the resources needed it’s time to fix our future.  I would like to see if Washington can social distance itself from reckless spending for awhile. https://t.co/TUQp4gb1WP

If you are a small business owner feeling the effects of Coronavirus there are resources to help you. For more information about low-interest loans business counseling and other resources please visit our website at https://t.co/SdNutKo2lr
Thank you @Hanes for working to retrofit some of you facilities to produce medical masks for our fight against Coronavirus. https://t.co/UMfR95XSgS

For too long economic policies have encouraged companies to shift manufacturing of vital medicines and equipment to China.  A lesson from the #Coronavirus is that we must be less reliant on China and keep our supply chains secure during times of crisis. Our safety depends on it.

I drove by the Greensboro Coliseum and looked out at the empty parking lot. I couldn't help but think of the student-athletes the fans and the vendors impacted by the Coronavirus cancellations. If we keep working and serving together we will make it through this time. https://t.co/DkytscpytB
Need assistance? North Carolina is here to help. Dial 2-1-1 for information or text COVIDNC to 898211 for the latest. https://t.co/59qRAhzHFr

If you are a small business owner feeling the effects of the #Coronavirus outbreak there are resources to help you.  Please visit the following link for guidance on applying for small business loans.  https://t.co/UNiLmarJI2
Timeline: The early days of China's coronavirus outbreak and cover-up. Incredible work by Axios. https://t.co/pdwbj2uzqt
We can all help slow the spread of the #Coronavirus.  For the most updated information visit our website at https://t.co/takHry8lOe.  #InItTogether https://t.co/jv5vaErwIn

Last week the House passed legislation to keep families healthy and give relief to our small businesses.  We will continue to work on your behalf to ensure local schools and health departments have all the necessary personnel and resources to fight the #Coronavirus. https://t.co/IxJ0vvpn89

HAPPENING NOW: Join us live for a telephone town hall with NC Emergency Management Director Mike Sprayberry and Wake Forest Baptist Chief Medical Officer Dr. Erik Summers as we answer your questions about the #Coronavirus outbreak.  Listen live here: https://t.co/t6Weqd81O9

I am disappointed in President Xi's decision to expel American journalists from their country.  Rather than limiting information this should be a time of openness & transparency to help us learn more about curbing the spread of #COVID19 around the world. https://t.co/bF34tQnkRU
Please join us tonight at 6pm for a telephone town hall on #Coronavirus impact in North Carolina ⬇️  (866) 478-3388 https://t.co/Q8OYCSerEP
US Rep. Mark Walker hosting a call-in coronavirus town hall on Tuesday for Triad area residents https://t.co/QKNqAfXqDf via @JournalNow
The North Carolina #Coronavirus Helpline is open for your questions about testing prevention and treatment.  For the most updated information dial 1-866-462-3821. https://t.co/rJk2TyMdzZ
Some great worship music and sermons online today but missing the interaction. Looking forward to assembling again soon. #CoronaChurch

ON TUESDAY at 6PM we are hosting a tele-town hall with the NC Director of Emergency Management & the Chief Medical officer at @wakehealth to answer your questions on the #Coronavirus.   Call in directly at (886) 478-3388 or sign up to be called ⬇️   https://t.co/zmmkvEV5I3
Thank you @DukeEnergy for ensuring that North Carolinians don’t have their power turned off because of financial hardship as a  result of #coronavirus. https://t.co/BrB1OIMHXK

Join us on Tuesday March 17th at 6pm for a telephone town hall and update on the #Coronavirus from @NCEmergency Director Mike Sprayberry and @wakehealth Chief Medical Officer Dr. Erik Summers.  Sign up to be contacted at the link below or dial in to 866-478-3388 on Tuesday. https://t.co/KAaGsORL6X

The #Coronavirus originated in Wuhan China.  China failed to contain the outbreak and lied about the number of patients.  China barred US health officials from entering the country to evaluate patients.  Now China is trying to say US troops are responsible? https://t.co/qMMw1mtzBD

Our job at the federal level is to work with state officials to make sure that we are keeping North Carolinians informed on the #Coronavirus.   Get the latest updates here or visit https://t.co/takHrypXcO. https://t.co/huvEsiZoSJ

Thank you @realDonaldTrump for your leadership in containing #COVID19 to protect the American people.  With 70% of new cases originating in Europe President Trump was correct once again making the right call for the safety of all Americans. https://t.co/hqUihxJarA

Getting an update from @DHSgov Acting Deputy Secretary Ken Cuccinelli and @CDCgov's Dr. Stephen Redd on our response to the #Coronavirus.  Thanks to this Administration's quick and decisive actions the United States is ready and capable to mitigate the effects of this outbreak. https://t.co/KuCpdjArk3
COMING UP: Tune in to Fox News @ANHQDC as I discuss our response to the #coronavirus outbreak with @GillianHTurner.

Thank you @VP for your strong leadership of the COVID-19 task force and for keeping Congress informed. Because you and @POTUS directed the full resources of the federal government to combat Coronavirus North Carolina and the country are better prepared and ready to respond. https://t.co/gak3Cgl2MR

As a member of @HomelandGOP I am continuing to work with state and local officials to ensure all necessary resources and personnel are available back home. We will keep open communication between North Carolina health officials and DC →  https://t.co/1xf8uITTBF #coronavirus

We knew this coronavirus was going to impact North Carolina and we were ready & prepared. As the NC Director of Emergency Management and I discussed this morning we have the health care and emergency responses in place to handle and contain this virus to the best of our ability.

The humanitarian security and health threats personified in the coronavirus are being exacerbated by authoritarian socialist policies and the dishonestly of foreign aggressors and abusers like China. https://t.co/CKAtP9qOUT #coronavirus

Sprayberry co-chair of the Novel Coronavirus Task Force in NC is respected nationwide for emergency management. As a member of @HomelandGOP we'll continue to keep the lines of communication open between the federal government and North Carolina.

Thanks @DirectorNCEM Sprayberry for connecting this morning.   NC has 8 trauma centers that are ready to go if needed + other hospitals that could be used for operational purposes.   Sprayberry said @CDCgov and @HHSGov communication has been timely and beneficial.  #coronavirus

@cvdanson Glad you asked! Today I am meeting with county commissioners across NC to ensure they are getting what they need from Washington receiving updates on our response to coronavirus and helping pass legislation that protects NC servicemembers from the harassment of debt collectors.

Just because @VP Mike Pence believes we are part of God’s creation does not mean he does not believe in science nor that he is unable to lead our efforts against coronavirus.   He’s the right man for the job and has been a leader in Congress in Indiana and in the @WhiteHouse. https://t.co/n4jmPUCPHW

Disaster by @SpeakerPelosi’s office at our unclassified congressional briefing on #coronavirus. Total disorganization - and she didn’t even show up! Maybe the Speaker should spend less time attacking @realDonaldTrump and be part of the solution. https://t.co/scrRTKTwur
Tune into @CuomoPrimeTime tonight at 11:20PM as I discuss our federal response to the #CoronavirusOutbreak and the reaction from Congress.

While we are still understanding the full scope of the #coronavirus we need to continue to prepare for future cases in the US.  As Ranking Member of Counterterrorism and Intelligence I will continue to push for the needed resources and personnel to protect our communities.

Despite an impending healthcare crisis House Democrats are trying to politicize our response to the #coronavirus epidemic.  Enough is enough. The House should immediately act to pass @realDonaldTrump’s request for resources to keep Americans safe.
